review: I have had the Fire TV and the Fire Stick.  I only have them for the Amazon Prime Video.  The stick was on sale for $19 and for that price it was an easy decision.  I recently hooked up the fire stick and it works much like the original fire tv, without voice search.  But the remote lag is almost a show-stopper.  It almost has a mind of it's own.  While trying to register the device it was very difficult to even enter an email address.  Now that I am over that the stick works well.
